articles.description: Why a Saturday night for the Las Vegas Grand Prix? Stefano Domenicali believes it is the "perfect time" for the race.
articles.content:
Stefano Domenicali, the Formula 1 CEO, says the Las Vegas Grand Prix taking place on a Saturday night is the perfect time.
